text: Events from the year 2004 in Sweden ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Carl XVI Gustaf * Prime Minister – Göran Persson ==Events== ==Deaths== Sune Bergström recipient of the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine. * 9 January - Börje Dorch, journalist (born 1929). * 15 August - Sune Bergström, biochemist (born 1916). * 9 November - Stieg Larsson, journalist and novelist (born 1954). * 17 November - Mikael Ljungberg, wrestler (born 1970). ==See also== * 2004 in Swedish television ==References== Category:Years of the 21st century in Sweden
title: 2004 in Sweden
